name: Reborn
description:
Reborn is the best place to create and discover stunning 3D experiences in VR, AR and MR. To join a live vtuber performance. To partner with friends to build and play an interactive game world, or with the most creative community members to create a musical dance experience, an anime, or even a film. You’ll find an endless stream of virtual experiences that feel personalized just for you.

Reborn is dedicated to helping every talented content creators, world crafters, virtual musicians, etc be seen by the world, grow involved fans network, and monetize.

You shine and amaze the world by your talents, not by who you are in real life and how others judge you. That’s reborn ;)

- Explore various artistic virtual experiences and worlds, made by world crafters just like you.
- Try our blender and unity SDK to build everything from functional props to multiplayer games to entire worlds.
- Join our burgeoning community. We value your suggestions and let's build the true metaverse together!
